    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Menacing Prowess](/Feats.aspx?ID=2736) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Golden League Xun](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=93)

**Prerequisites**
[Golden League Xun Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2734); Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

Scaring off multiple people at once is your specialty. When you [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), you can target up to 2 creatures within 30 feet of you at once. If you are a master of Intimidation, you can Demoralize up to 4 creatures at once; if you're legendary, you can Demoralize up to 8 creatures at once.
